item.title: Funding Resources for Junior Women in Machine Learning and Statistics
item.description: Fellowships, Scholarships, and Grants Below is a list of fellowships, scholarships, and grants for graduate students, typically geared toward women or underrepesented groups in computing: Microsoft Ada Lovelace PhD Fellowship: 2nd year PhD students at time of application Microsoft Dissertation Grant: 4th year PhD or above at time of application Women Techmakers Scholarship: undergraduate, masters, and PhD students Gertrude M. Cox Scholarship: MS or PhD students Loreal USA for Women in Science: postdoctoral fellowship Conference support Many organizations offer travel awards for graduate students and postdocs to attend conferences.
